Freelancing for WordPress/WooCommerce web development.  From the most complex plugins/extensions, to custom theme development.  Creating code that meets or exceeds standards for various business and individuals around the world.  Currently selling premium plugins at rayflores.com.

Joined Socious in June, and have the following responsibilities:- Implementation of Socious Tools for each new client- Creative Works for new clients- Code Works for development of new client builds- Client support for implementation

Freelance services including WordPress Theme Developement, front-end web development, WordPress Plugin Development, WooCommerce Extensions enhancements, Custom WooCommerce Extensions, webmaster services, and maintenance services as well.Handle all projects from start to finish, including administrative aspects.Communicate directly with customers to establish project parameters, on-going progress reporting and deliverables handed over under the timeline established.Develop web sites from start to finish, including standard, hybrid, blogs and e-commerce sites.

Ray Flores brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the COBE team, Mr. Flores' expertise is predominantly found in market strategy, site selection/acquisition, negotiations , leasing, consulting, representation, and development.  Ray brings more than 12 years in real estate expertise. He is experienced in the areas of retail tenant representation and development.  Ray is a licensed Arizona real estate sales person.From the start of his real estate career, Ray took a, then, small retailer to new heights.  Stating with 17 units in the southwest, Ray assisted Cold Stone Creamery's expansion plans to the east.  Ultimately placing Cold Stone in Times Square, NY.  From there, Ray has held leadership positions with retailers like Jamba Juice, Bank of America (CBRE/GCSG), and others.  The growth that Ray accomplished with those retailers lead him to begin his own book of business and grow each customer accordingly.

Senior Transaction Manager in Retail Development with more than 12 years experience as manager and leader in development companies. Expertise lies in increasing sales performance and brand presence in market, developing new business opportunities, and implementing new marketing strategies. Key strengths include training, mentoring, team building and communication skills. Developed and implemented sound plans resulting in recognition for performance and leadership. Solution oriented, goal driven innovator with excellent communication, leadership and client relations skills.  Currently on the Bank of America Account for Global Client Services Group of CBRE.

summary: Higher Logic:: Providing clients by supporting their implementation of the Higher Logic tools, Ray Flores provides great value to the online community atmosphere.  At Higher Logic, as a Senior Implementation Manager, Ray implements new customers onto the Higher Logic tools, and allows for new to experience smooth transition from old to new.  Working with backend datasets and frontend web development on a daily basis, he can be found behind the computer utlizing the Higher Logic online community tools, eclipse, PHPstorm and all types of web interfaces and API's.  Ray uses a variety of web languages: PHP, TWIG, jQuery, HTML/HTML5 and CSS/CSS3 as well as computer programs such as Microsoft Office Suite and Adobe Creative Suite as well.  WordPress/Woocommerce Development ::While moonlighting, I enjoy spending time helping others create their ideal WordPress/WooCommerce customizations.  From early 2004, he has been granted various tasks of customizing websites that use WordPress/WooCommerce in some way, shape, or form.  From the most intricate instances of code, to simple HTML modifications, there is seldom an issue that I cannot solve.  Real Estate :: From the start of his real estate career, Ray took a, then small retailer, to new heights. Starting with 17 units in the southwest, Ray assisted Cold Stone Creamery's expansion plans to the east. Ultimately placing Cold Stone in Times Square, NY, and ended his four year employment when CSC was just above the 900 unit mark.From there, Ray has held leadership positions with retailers like Jamba Juice, Bank of America (CBRE/GCSG), and others. Specialties: Project Management, Team Leader, Leadership, Marketing, Sales, Team Building, Time Management, Negotiation.**Web Development, WordPress Customization, WordPress Support, WordPress Theme Development, WordPress Plugin Develoment, Corporate Internet Presence, Adobe Master Suite, API, RESTful API
